title: Summer is approaching!
body:
Who are you hoping will get Pool Party skins this year? :3
http://i.imgur.com/7HSYqbX.gif

replies.body: {{champion:268}} Lounging on the beach while building a sand replica of Shimura.

{{champion:268}} THIS IS SHURIMAN LAND!
{{champion:15}} Azir, get down from there! This is a private beach!
{{champion:268}} NO BEACH IS SAFE FROM SHURIMAN CONTROL!
{{champion:58}} Hey, dude. Beach is restricted here, man.
{{champion:75}} Renekton, why are you talking like that?
{{champion:58}} It's not Renekton, bro. It's Renekki, dude.
{{champion:75}} Xerath, what have you done to him?!?
{{champion:101}} Hey, don't look at me. I never saw him do stuff like this.
{{champion:268}} SIVIR, IN YOUR OPINION, WOULD DRAPES OR CURTAINS BE BETTER?
{{champion:15}} WHAT'S THE DIFFERENCE?!? IT's all sand!
{{champion:268}} COME INSIDE AND I'LL SHOW YOU!
{{champion:58}} Dude, high tide's comin' in!
{{champion:267}} WEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!
{{champion:105}} SHAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAARK!
{{champion:268}} *Raises a wall of sand soldiers* MAKE SHURIMA GREAT AGAIN!

To be continued...
you win the internet for today,
He can raise sand people with Pool Party Yorick.

I know I heard a wyvern around here somewhere...
https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-dvegSbBKW38/UqidgTD130I/AAAAAAAAAlo/KFcCaJIs49k/w532-h339/MH3-Lagiacrus_LS.png
Monster Hunter FTW!!!
Since I'm an uneducated swine who has never played monster hunter... can you explain this?

Hunters from Monster Hunter are normal (if strong) humans that go out and hunt massive wyverns, beasts, and dragons to protect their village, and harvest the rare materials in/on their bodies. In order to do this, Hunters use the parts from the monsters they hunt to produce weapons and armor that channels the might of the original beast. Hunters hunt from "small" (dog sized) bugs and raptors, to living cataclysms like the Shagaru Magala which infects entire mountains with its virus, the Akantor who's passive heat desiccates areas, the dreaded Fatalis which hunts city sized eldar dragons, and the island spanning Raviente.

The joke mainly comes from the fact that Shyvana's dragon form looks very similar (if smaller) to Monster Hunter's Pseudo-Wyverns like the Tigrex.

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/monsterhunter/images/f/ff/BlkTigrex-Roar.gif  - Tigrex
http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/deathbattlefanon/images/0/0e/Shagaru.gif - Shagaru Magala
http://67.media.tumblr.com/e551e2dd62e0fc0eae8f929a4aecd7cf/tumblr_ndtg62Q3A01tzhx1po5_250.gif - Akantor
https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-weItN0v6aBU/VoIsUUanKuI/AAAAAAAAC6o/I-ggNjbYDhA/w270-h151/https%2525253A%2525252F%2525252F49.media.tumblr.com%2525252Fa4d1ec48c4c5bcc5860568c9d522b356%2525252Ftumblr_njcgyohLVm1sw2dzxo1_400.gif - Fatalis
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jbgLgtkcHeY - Raviente eating and aftermath.

http://i.neoseeker.com/ca/monster_hunter_3_conceptart_aobM3.jpg - You

Now go out there and ~~die to~~ hunt some elder dragons that can insta-kill you. Did I mention that the game can be Dark Souls hard if you don't have the right gear (and sometimes when you do)? Should I also mention that when a Tigrex showed up in Metal Gear Solid: Peacewalker shooting RPGs at its face only pissed it off?

WHERE IS THE WYVERN AT?!
http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/monsterhunter/images/5/5a/MH4-Bow_Equipment_Render_001.png/revision/latest?cb=20140610184349
{{champion:432}} Mine can teleport you to space and watch your body be ripped apart while just staring at you... you're a dragon, not a god.
